title: Among the Sleep Enhanced Edition Free Download
description:
Among the Sleep Enhanced Edition Download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
Among the Sleep is a first person horror adventure , in which you play a two year old child. After waking up in the middle of the night to mysterious sounds, you start exploring the dark looking for comfort. The game explores horror through atmosphere and exploration, not with scores and combat systems.
In Among the Sleep you’re vulnerable , scared, and trying to make sense of the world. In the story, you will play as a little girl whose mother has not lived with her father for a long time. And so, the next birthday ended not at all the way the main character would like. She was waiting for her dad, but her mother did not let him go to her daughter – all the girl received was a teddy bear, which in the end turned out to be very difficult. He is alive, talking, and ready to follow his mistress wherever he goes.
